clues.text: (Jay Leno presents the clue.) First produced in 1955, the Citroen DS remains to this day the most innovative car ever designed... in 1962 it saved the life ofthisFrench president when its hydropneumatic suspension kept his car under control at 70 MPH when assassins shot out a tire
